/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the unseen wind, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. A solitary figure can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the otherwise still scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is a beautiful representation of a typical day in Beijing, with its blend of nature and urban life.
